item.title: CVE-2022-4554|2024-08-03T01:41:45.642Z -- id%20software%20project%20and%20consultancy%20services -- b2b%20customer%20ordering%20system
item.description: B2B Customer Ordering System developed by ID Software Project and Consultancy Services before version 1.0.0.347 has an authenticated Reflected XSS vulnerability. This has been fixed in the version 1.0.0.347.
